forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this morning. Remaining cloudy. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 2C. SW winds shifting to SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 36F. SW winds shifting to SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 44F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Some snow showers mixing in late. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
